targets.expr: sum by (id, title, type, color, icon) (voltsp_node_graph_info{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"})
sum by (id, source, target) (voltsp_node_graph_edges_info{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"})

sum (rate(voltsp_volt_procedure_invocation_errors_total{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum (rate(voltsp_volt_procedure_invocation_aborts_total{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum (rate(voltsp_volt_procedure_invocation_timeouts_total{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"}[$__rate_interval]))
group by (pipeline, source, kafka_topic) (voltsp_stream_source_info{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"})
group by (pipeline, sink, sink_target) (voltsp_stream_sink_info{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"})

panels.title: VoltDB invocation timeouts, errors and aborts

targets.expr:
sum by (procedure_name)
(
   histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(voltsp_volt_procedure_invocation_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace="$cluster", pipeline=~"$pipeline", host_name=~"$host"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, procedure_name))
)

panels.description:
Direct - shows the number of writes that the client believes it knows the master for, and for which it has an active network connection.
RoundRobin - reflect transactions routed using round-robin, which can happen if the client has no active connection to the partition master.
panels.title: Writes
System Configuration (please select single pipeline from dropdown)
